video.title: Lindsay Price and boyfriend Robert Buckley out and about in New York City
video.description: Actress Lindsay Price and boyfriend/actor Robert Buckley (both of 'Lipstick Jungle') leave the '10th Annual Key To The Cure Charity Shopping Weekend' event at Top of the Rock in Rockefeller Center. All of the photographers yell Lindsay's name and don't show any interest in her boyfriend, who doesn't seem to appreciate the lack of attention very much. Lindsay nearly stops to pose, until she realizes Robert has already ran off, at which point she races off to catch up to him.
